comments.content: I do not know, but in my experience, most major script on packaging like this is hand-lettered.
Indeed. However this seems to have some identical glyphs.

It does look like a font, but of course it could be custom, for a corporation this size.

I have been looking through the Script ID Guide, and noticed that ['Malbeck'](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021204857/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/ScriptSmall5/Malbeck.gif) by Alejandro Paul & Angel Koziupa (Umbrella Type at Veer) has a lot of similarities. That might be an alternative, if we don't find the actual font.

- Mike Yanega
